user_description.ru: Ты плюёшь ему в лицо или в рот. Он покорно принимает.
user_description.en: You spit in his face or mouth. He submissively accepts.

ai_description.ru: Она плюёт ему в лицо, он принимает покорно. Её слюна — знак её власти и его ничтожности. Femdom унижение.
ai_description.en: She spits in his face, he accepts submissively. Her saliva — a sign of her power and his worthlessness. Femdom humiliation.

image_prompt: woman close to man's face preparing to spit, man looking up at her with open mouth, both partially clothed, bedroom setting
